headline.print_headline: Report: Raising Legal Age for Tobacco Would Stop, Delay Use
headline.main: Report: Raising Legal Age for Tobacco Would Stop, Delay Use

docs.lead_paragraph: Raising the legal age to buy tobacco to higher than 18 would likely prevent premature death for hundreds of thousands of people, according to a report issued Thursday by the Institute of Medicine.
docs.snippet: Raising the legal age to buy tobacco to higher than 18 would likely prevent premature death for hundreds of thousands of people, according to a report issued Thursday by the Institute of Medicine.
